content: विश्रब्ध {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} (also written विस्रब्ध) {@--1@} Confided in, confided to, entrusted. {@--2@} Confident, fearless, confiding; <ls>Mu. 3. 3.</ls> {@--3@} Trusty, confidential. {@--4@} Quiet, calm, tranquil, free from anxiety. {@--5@} Firm, steady. {@--6@} Meek, lowly. {@--7@} Excessive, exceeding. --ब्धं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Confidently, fearlessly, without reserve, fear, or hesitation; विश्रब्धं क्रियतां वराहततिभिर्मुस्ताक्षतिः पल्ले <ls>Ś. 2. 6</ls>; वृषल विश्रब्धं पृच्छ ममापि वह्वाख्येयमत्र <ls>Mu. 3.</ls>
